name: Elf's Revenge
description:
The Elf's Revenge is a game about one of Santa's little helpers, who gets tired of the system in the factory. He only has one free day per year to enjoy and relax and he is paid in a tiny bag of candy. Who does that? What can you do with a bag of candy besides getting a belly ache?

If you shoot an elf you'll get 3 points, if you it a reindeer you'll get 5 points and if you hit Santa, you'll get 10 points.

Controllers:

WASD - Movement

Left Shift - Run

Mouse - Character Rotation & Bazooka Aim

Mouse Left Click - Shoot

1 - Mouse Lock

2 - Mouse Unlock

This game is not completely finished, bugs might and will happen.

For the purpose of the course unit which this game was made for, please answer the quiz on the following link:

https://forms.gle/tRWkhcNWE8cxe9KNA
